description: Change of use from B1 office accommodation to create nine residential flats (comprising one x three-bedroom flat, two x two-bedroom flats, three x one-bedroom flats, and three x studio flats); together with associated external works comprising: demolition of single storey garage; excavation to create lightwell to south side of building with french doors created at basement level on south elevation and provision of stairs in lightwell; creation of stair access to basement level within north lightwell and replacement of basement level door on north elevation; creation of new ground and first floor windows in south elevation; creation of second floor roof terrace with glass balustrade to edge on south elevation, with replacement of window with french doors to provide access; hard and soft landscaping including provision of four parking spaces; and alterations to boundary treatment (associated listed building consent application ref: P120363 also submitted).
